title: Crashing on loading game
body:
So iv been away for awhile and thought i would download LOL agen.... Iv managed to have 2 matches in the past 3h becouse every time i join a match the screen is black and it says i cant connect to the game server.. 
i can pick a hero but as soon as it starts the loading screen it go's black then about 20 sec later i get a pop up saying i cant connect to server...

thanks for this kinda makes me not wanna play now 

ps: i know its not my net as i have very good internet and i can connect to other stuff like youtube, fb, and ofc typing this

replies.body: The black screen your seeing is usually a result of a poor network issue hindering communication with our servers.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
